body.name: James Patterson Books in Order: Alex Cross series, Women's Murder Club series, Michael Bennett, Private, Maximum Ride, Daniel X, Middle School, I Funny, ... novels & nonfiction. (Series Order Book 4)
body.description: James Patterson Books in OrderFully updated 2024 EditionLooking for a reading list of all James Patterson’s books?Need a checklist to find the books you’ve missed?Confused by sequels and prequels or because series books aren’t numbered?Want to read the books in the best order?Struggling to keep up with new releases?You aren’t alone. These are common problems we all have. But no more. Now, get this info exactly where you need it – on your ereader! James Patterson Books in Order is the most comprehensive bibliography available, plus it has an author biography.What’s Included?Alex Cross series in orderAlex Cross short stories in orderWomen's Murder Club series in orderWomen's Murder Club short storiesMichael Bennett series in orderNYPD Red, John Roscoe, Private…Daniel X, Witch and Wizard, Maximum Ride…Middle School, I Funny, House of Robots, Confessions...all Bookshots, short stories, novels and nonfictionplus, a James Patterson biography.By knowing the Alex Cross book order, or the Women's Murder Club book order, you’ll enjoy James Patterson’s books far more. Keep this ebook on your tablet, phone, computer, or ereader, so the info you need is at your fingertips.“Can’t I just Google it?”This information has NOT simply been ‘copied and pasted’ from the first website to pop up, but has been meticulously curated from multiple sources and then compiled into the best reader-friendly format. You could Google it and find some info, yes, which you could then paste into Word, then buy software to convert that into an ebook, then manually load it onto your ereader… And save a measly $0.99! Isn’t your time worth more than that?Any Book In TWO CLICKSWith this ebook, you can go directly to any James Patterson title in just two clicks. No typing. No searching. Just two clicks. All for $0.99! You’d be crazy to waste all that time doing all that work, and still have to search for every title manually, only to save less than a buck!Why is Series Order Important?Reading books in the right order is more fun because you’ll see:characters developing naturally.plot twists, which impact future stories, in the correct timeline.new characters at the right moment.James Patterson Books in Order helps you to read the Alex Cross books in order, just as James intended.No More Book SearchesEverything is on your ereader, so no more problems with:Misleading publication datesChanged titlesPrequels and stories released out of sequence…Book Lists on Steroids!Each ebook in this series has Special Features which no other reading list has.#1 – Books In One ClickSpecial links let you access every book the author has ever written in ONE CLICK!#2 – Best Story OrderWhenever applicable, titles are listed by the publication date AND the best reading order, i.e., books, prequels, and short stories are specially arranged (often called chronological order).#3 – Award Star RatingsRate any title right on your ereader.#4 – A Personal ChecklistTrack what you read to see where you are in a series.#5 – Author BioA concise biography of your favorite author.#6 – Useful InfoWhere possible, info about page counts, movie adaptations, co-authors, etc., is included.#7 – Alternative TitlesNever again buy a book you’ve already read, saving you time, money, and frustration.Exclusive GiftGrab a FREE bestselling thriller. Just click a link at the back of the book.IMPORTANTThis is a reference book to help you enjoy the author's work, NOT a collection of novels. Get the best James Patterson book list now!Click BUY NOW!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps to Read Books In Order
reviews.reviewText: I have read many, many of Patterson's Books. Loved 95% of them. This Books in Order, not only helps me read in order, but reminds me of the ones I have already read & want to read again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I buy a lot of patterson books especially on my kindle. It is very handy since i like to read his series in order.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This listing of the books in order and grouping by each series was very helpful for me to know which books I still needed to read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Alex Cross Series is very entertaining and the books ...
reviews.reviewText: The Alex Cross Series is very entertaining and the books hard to stop reading. Involvement with the characters and story line is superb. Can't wait to read the whole series!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2018
reviews.reviewText: It helps me keep track of what I have read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars THIS IS NOT A BOOK BUT A LISTING ON THE PUBLISHER'S WEBSITE
reviews.reviewText: Difficult to use and not able to print the list, which is what I wanted todo so that I could check off the novels I had read so that I would not buy one again that I had already read. I read 72 books last year and keeping track of which book I have read is not easy, which is why I wanted to print a list that I could keep by my computer. If I had been able to do that, this would be a 5-star product. Just a reminder that THIS IS NOT A BOOK BUT A LISTING ON THE PUBLISHER'S WEBSITE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great reference book
reviews.reviewText: I needed a reference for all the titles available from Patterson. I have read a lot of them through the years. I would have liked something about the book under the title. I would recommend to anyone new to James Patterson or someone like me trying to catch up with new titles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Order of book publishing
reviews.reviewText: GOOD BOOK TO ORGANIZE THE READINGS OF PATTERSON.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 21, 2021
Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 12, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: Allows you to Mark of books as they are read

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 2, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Helped me read them in the correct way. Have read some before but not in sequence. First book that got my Son in to reading.
